highlights.text: Fix: Channel value coloring (Power/SNR) now uses correct per modulation thresholds instead of hardcoded 256QAM values
Fix: Summary cards and health banner now aggregate from per channel assessments, fixing false warnings for DOCSIS 3.1 and 64QAM channels
Fix: Corrected DOCSIS 3.1 Upstream thresholds (Tolerated/Monthly limits were too high). Thanks @dNhax!
Fix: LLM Export now shows correct Modulation-Aware Thresholds (VFKD) in the 'Reference Values' section
New: Enhanced LLM Export â€” Includes historical Events (48h), Speedtests, and Incident Journal for deeper AI analysis
New: Export Mode selector (Full Context vs. Update) to save tokens
New: Configurable HA Discovery Prefix in Settings (Advanced MQTT) â€” fixes Issue #12
Improved: MQTT config validation prevents empty prefixes
New: Per-Channel Timeline â€” view power, SNR, errors, and modulation history for individual channels
New: Modulation change timeline with upgrade/downgrade indicators
Improved: US channels show power chart only (no empty error chart)
Updated sidebar icons for Signal Trends and Channel Timeline
Fix: Container going unhealthy on fresh installs before first data poll
Fix: Crash when saving empty config values (e.g. MQTT port)
Modulation-aware thresholds: Each channel assessed by its actual modulation (256QAM, 64QAM, 1024QAM)
Configurable thresholds.json: Adjust signal limits to your ISP's guidelines
DOCSIS 3.1 upstream: Fritz!Box 6 dB offset correctly applied
Fix: Crash when saving empty config values (e.g. MQTT port)
Speedtest-Signal Correlation: Expand any speedtest to see DOCSIS signal data at that time
Plain-language tooltips explaining every metric on the dashboard
Timezone fix for accurate speedtest-snapshot matching
Modulation Watchdog: Downgrades trigger warning/critical alerts based on QAM hierarchy
Smart severity: 256QAMâ†’16QAM = critical, 64QAMâ†’256QAM upgrade = info
Mobile: Hamburger menu now opens correctly as slide-in overlay
Speedtest card color reflects actual vs. booked speed (green/yellow/red)
Event badge updates correctly after acknowledging events
Incident Journal: Document ISP issues with attachments
Event Log: Automatic signal anomaly detection with history
Sidebar sections: Organized navigation with category labels
Chart zoom modal for detailed signal analysis
What's New splash on updates
Interactive charts powered by Chart.js
Cleaner topbar and date navigation
Multi-platform Docker build (amd64 + arm64)
Optimized Dockerfile with multi-stage builds
CI version injection fix
